document_data.name: Grin Ousstyl
document_data.mainbody: '''Grin Ousstyl''' was a [[drow]] [[wizard]] and apprentice of archmage [[Vizeran DeVir]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Grin hailed from [[House Ousstyl (Menzoberranzan)|House Ousstyl]] of [[Menzoberranzan]]. He tried to advance his position by joining the [[Council of  Spiders|Council of Spiders]]. However he was careless and was nearly executed for his ambition. Exiled from Menzoberranzan, he was taken in by Vizeran, who played the role of the shadowy patron of the council.

Grin supported his master's plots, hoping to find a way to reclaim his city from the [[matron mother]]s' tyranny.

However, during the execution of the plan to send back the demon lords, Grin revealed that his master wanted to destroy Menzoberranzan in the process, and tried to convince a group of adventurers to change the location of the banishing ritual.
document_data.Personality: Grin was loyal to his master but disliked such a solitary existence. For a long time, he had waited for a chance to return to his city, supporting the idea of a male uprising. Grin would not agree with his master if he found Menzoberranzan was to become a battleground for [[demon lord]]s.
